source:
%matplotlib inline
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

location_df = Mother['Location'].apply(lambda x: pd.Series(x.split(', ')))

loc_cols= ['City','State']

location_df.columns=loc_cols

location_df.State.replace('OR', 'Oregon', inplace=True)
location_df.State.replace('TN', 'Tennessee', inplace=True)
location_df.State.replace('SC', 'South Carolina', inplace=True)
location_df.State.replace('WA', 'Washington', inplace=True)
location_df.State.replace('CA', 'California', inplace=True)
location_df.State.replace('District of Columbia', 'D.C.', inplace=True)
Mother.drop(['Mental Health Sources', 'longitude', 'longitude', 'Location', 'Race', 'Where obtained', 'Mental Health' ], axis=1, inplace=True)
Mother.drop(['Sources', 'Type', 'Type of weapons', 'Weapon details'], axis=1, inplace=True)

WeaponCat = pd.read_table('MotherWeaponCategories - Sheet1.csv', sep=',', usecols=['Date', 'Types Of Weapon', 'Semiauto handguns', 'Rifles', 'Revolvers', 'Shotgun'])
GunLawRank = pd.read_table('GunLawRank - Sheet1.csv', sep=',')
StateNum = pd.read_table('State Code - Sheet1.csv', sep=',')

source:
index = StateNum.set_index('State')
result = GunLawRank.join(index, on=['State'])

indexB = WeaponCat.set_index('Date')
resultB = Mother.join(indexB, on=['Date'])

indexC = result.set_index('State')
resultC = resultB.join(indexC, on=['State'])

Jones = resultC
Jones.rename(columns={'Total victims':'Total'}, inplace=True)
###Jones is new working table
Jones.dropna(inplace = True)
Jones.drop(['Summary', 'Date', 'Gender', 'latitude'], axis = 1, inplace=True)

outputs.name: stdout
text: Kuwaiti-born Mohammod Youssuf Abdulazeez, 24, a naturalized US citizen, opened fire at a Naval reserve center, and then drove to a military recruitment office where he shot and killed four Marines and a Navy service member, and wounded a police officer and another military service member. He was then fatally shot in an exchange of gunfire with law enforcement officers responding to the attack.

outputs.name: stdout
text: Dylann Storm Roof, 21, shot and killed 9 people after opening fire at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, South Carolina. According to a roommate, he had allegedly been â€œplanning something like that for six months."

outputs.name: stdout
text:
Jaylen Fryberg, 15, using a .40-caliber Berretta, shot five
 students at Marysville High School, including two of his cousins and three friends, killing all but one. Fryberg arranged to meet them for lunch in the school cafeteria by text. Fryberg was reportedly well-liked at the school and there was not believed to be any ill-will between him and his victims. He committed suicide at the scene.

outputs.name: stdout
text: Cherie Lash Rhoades, 44, opened fire at the Cedarville Rancheria Tribal Office and Community Center, killing four and wounding two. After running out of ammunition, Rhoades grabbed a butcher knife and stabbed another person.

outputs.name: stdout
text: Aaron Alexis, 34, a military veteran and contractor from Texas, opened fire in the Navy installation, killing 12 people and wounding 8 before being shot dead by police.

outputs.name: stdout
text: Pedro Vargas, 42, set fire to his apartment, killed six people in the complex, and held another two hostages at gunpoint before a SWAT team stormed the building and fatally shot him.

outputs.name: stdout
text: John Zawahri, 23, armed with a homemade assault rifle and high-capacity magazines, killed his brother and father at home and then headed to Santa Monica College, where he was eventually killed by police.

outputs.name: stdout
text: Dennis Clark III, 27, shot and killed his girlfriend in their shared apartment, and then shot two witnesses in the building's parking lot and a third victim in another apartment, before being killed by police.

outputs.name: stdout
text: Kurt Myers, 64, shot six people in neighboring towns, killing two in a barbershop and two at a car care business, before being killed by officers in a shootout after a nearly 19-hour standoff.

outputs.name: stdout
text: Adam Lanza, 20, shot his mother dead at their home then drove to Sandy Hook Elementary school. He forced his way inside and opened fire, killing 20 children and six adults before committing suicide.

outputs.name: stdout
